short_summary: The government is seeking bids and the contract will be awarded under standing offer to meet their needs for meat, poultry, fish and or seafood.
description: Description of solicitation,  To purchase       meat and poultry products delivered within         Quebec.  The solicitation is for purchase of a multitude of products.
